description.tooltip: Espace dans les fichiers des bases de données
description.label: Fichiers et taille de bases

queries.query: SELECT DB_NAME(mf.database_id) as db, mf.file_id as fichier, mf.type_desc as [type], mf.name, (CAST(mf.size as bigint) * 8192) / 1024 / 1024 as Size_In_MB, CASE mf.max_size WHEN 0 THEN 'fixe' WHEN -1 THEN 'unlimited' WHEN 268435456 THEN '2 To' ELSE CAST(CAST(mf.max_size as bigint) / 128 as varchar(50)) + ' MB' END as max_size, CASE mf.is_percent_growth WHEN 1 THEN CAST(mf.growth as varchar (20)) + '%' ELSE CAST((mf.growth * 8192) / 1024 / 1024 as varchar (20)) + ' MB' END FROM sys.master_files mf ORDER BY mf.database_id, mf.file_id;
